import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import top2 from '../components/Img/top2.png' import top3 from '../components/Img/top3.png' import top4 from '../components/Img/top4.png' function AcadCordinator() { const List = [top2,top3,top4,top2,top3, top4] const [val, setVal] = useState(0); const Handlevalup = ()=>{ if(val < List.length -1) setVal(val+1); } const Handlevaldown = ()=>{ if(val>0) setVal(val-1); } return ( <>
Priya Verma Phone No :XXXXXX4567 Email :Xyz@nitj.ac.in
) } export default AcadCordinator
